title: RIOT WHAT THE FK ARE U DOING?
body:
**Hi, Raiot.
I don't know where to go. I write it down here. 

Today is my worst day.
Because you let me initialize my ID.
I don't know why I did this, but ...
I'd like to return my I.P. and R.P, and all the time I've invested.
Oh, the skin and the gold rims are gone, too!

Restore as soon as possible.
And do something straight.**

replies.body: Hmmmmm I'm not entirely sure what's going down here, but you're more than welcome to hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for any refund type requests, or feel free to elaborate more for me here!
